name: Logger
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!

Features are currently a tad limited. We plan to add more to this over time. If you have any feedback, feel free to let us know at our discord.
 - https://dsc.gg/the-shit-show

Use `[p]help Logger` to get the list of commands and how to use them.
short: Logging cog for use by bot owners
description: Log events to a specified channel in the bot owner's guild.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistantly store data or metadata about users.
